name: Diabolik 2: La Gemma di Salomone
overview: Diabolik 2: La Gemma di Salomone is an Amiga arcade 2d adventure game released in 1993 by Simulmondo,, which was released in Europe in 1993. Diabolik is a infamous master thief and anti-hero from the (fictional) Italian city of Clerville. His original personal was a more ruthless approach to getting what he wanted, later becoming more of a Robin Hood, type stealing from criminals and restraining from unnecessary violence.
